title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

for Health) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister health) order 2021

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Páraic Gallagher, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Páraic Gallagher, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, Block 1, Miesian Plaza, 50-58 Lower 
Baggot Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Health with effect from 18 January 2021. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

18 May, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [288] 3
text_norm: 2 paraic gallagher particular whose address deposited office department health block 1 miesian plaza 50-58 lower baggot street dublin 2 appointed special adviser minister health effect 18 january 2021 given official seal government 18 may 2021 micheal martin taoiseach notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 21st may 2021 288 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of this Order is to appoint a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [288]
